entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
